attributes.review:
This app is quite possibly the most complicated app I‚Äôve ever downloaded.  I have never had this type of experience with an app before.  First, it crashed 8 times before I could even get into the sign in screen.

The questions it asked were very difficult to understand and I did not appreciate it.  Once I finally answered the various questions to the best of my ability, the app crashed AGAIN.  This is absolutely outrageous.  

I went to look at Trumps plans for education, climate change, and equal protection, but I kept receiving an error message, almost as if there wasn‚Äôt a plan.  I don‚Äôt know if this portion of the app is not yet designed but I would think it should be since this has been on the App Store for quite awhile now.  

Overall, I am just very disappointed in the app and I expected better.
